Body:
Trying to work with sym keys to provisioning using azure dps

MSFT ref docs: How to provision legacy devices using symmetric keys.

MSFT defines azure capable legacy devices with the following characteristics

  1. Legacy devices may not have a certificate
column10:
or any other security feature that can be used to securely identify the device.
  • Identity usually consists of a single piece of information
column11:
either a mac address or serial number
  • Some method of updating device code to use the Azure Device Provisioning Service to provision these devices
    1. Can I get a clear definition (tech sheet) on what constitutes a legacy device?
    2. What portion of existing IoT devices are classified under the legacy category?
    3. Example of legacy devices available.
    "
